name: Thunder Jolt
description: Delivers a powerful electric shock to the opponent.

name: Quick Attack
description: This is an almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the pokemon charges and slams into the foe with its whole body.

name: Vine Whip
description: The Pokémon uses its cruel whips to strike the opponent.

name: Fire Spin
description: Fire Spin inflicts damage and traps the target for 2-5 turns, damaging the target at the end of each turn.

name: Slash
description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades.

name: Hydro Pump
description: Does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Splash
description: This attack does nothing.

name: Razor Leaf
description: A Grass-type attack that sends sharp-edged leaves at the target.

name: Solar Beam
description: A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the 2nd turn.

name: Petal Dance
description: The pokemon scatters petals to harm the opponent.

name: Scratch
description: Scratches the target with sharp claws.

name: Ember
description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water. Target.

name: Bite
description: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

name: Psywave
description: A wave of psychic powers that does a lot of damage.

name: Miracle Power
description: Mystical Power inflicts damage and raises either the user's offensive stats or defensive stats.

name: Psychic
description: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage.

name: Psyburn
description: The pokemon brings down a powerful psychic beam on his original position, dealing damage to enemies around each point of impact, leaving them unable to act for 1s and decreasing their Defense by 20% for 3 turns.

name: Aeroblast
description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage.

name: Recover
description: Recover restores up to 50% of the user's maximum HP.

name: Sacred Fire
description: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave a burn.

name: Rainbow Burn
description: The opponent gets hit with a rainbow colored flame that does a lot of damage.
